awd_abstract_narration: The major goal of Project Linkage is to increase the number                     and effectiveness of Wisconsin partnership programs that                        stress science and mathematics education.  The Wisconsin                        Academy of Sciences, Arts, and Letters plans to accomplish                      this task by (1) identifying existing appropriate                               partnerships, (2) developing a framework for improved                           understanding of the initiations, implementations, and                          outcomes associated with these partnerships, (3) conducting                     and disseminating case studies for specific partnership                         components, (4) creating a climate for the awareness and                        importance of existing partnerships, (5) encouraging and                        assisting the formation of new partnerships, and (6)                            developing a continuing linkage of existing and projected                       partnerships through a newsletter and annual conference.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)

inst.inst_name: Wisconsin Academy of Sciences Arts & Letters
